column4:
1. Server
Requires Node.js 20 LTS and npm.
Supports running backend, frontend, and admin via:
npm run dev (all services)
npm run server --prefix backend (backend only)
2. Database
Uses MongoDB (Atlas or local).
Must configure MONGO_URL in backend/.env.
.env also requires credentials for VNPAY / Stripe / MoMo.
3. Web Browser
Modern browser needed to access:
Frontend UI: http://localhost:5173
Admin Dashboard: http://localhost:5174

column5: Description
column6: Pre-Condition

column5: Admin login with valid credentials
column6: Admin account exists

column5: Login attempt with incorrect password
column6: Admin email exists

column5: Access admin API without token
column6: No Authorization token sent

column5: Create a new category with valid data
column6: Admin is logged in with a valid token

column5: Send empty body when creating category
column6: Admin is logged in

column5: Create a new food item with valid data
column6: Admin logged in and category exists

column5: Submit invalid variants payload such as variants=abc
column6: Admin is logged in

column5: Update food status active or inactive
column6: Admin token and valid foodId

column5: Update status of a food variant
column6: Admin or branch manager with valid branch

column5: Branch manager without branchId attempts an action
column6: Manager logged in

column5: Get full staff list
column6: Admin logged in

column5: Branch manager attempts to create staff with role manager
column6: Manager logged in

column5: Update staff active or inactive status
column6: Admin logged in and valid staffId

column5: Submit invalid status value such as vacation
column6: Admin logged in

column5: Branch manager attempts to reset staff password
column6: Manager logged in

column5: Manager tries to move staff to another branch
column6: Manager logged in with valid staffId

column5: Admin updates an order status
column6: Admin logged in and valid orderId

column5: Normal user attempts to update order status
column6: Normal user logged in nonadmin role

column3: Authorization and Branch Scope (Admin vs Branch Manager)
column5: Verify role-based access and branch scope: branch manager can only view/modify data within their assigned branch; admin can access all branches.
column6: Admin and Manager accounts exist; at least 2 branches exist with separate data.

column5: View and update restaurant configuration; validate required fields and persistence.
column6: Admin logged in; restaurant configuration feature enabled.

column5: Upload/replace restaurant logo/image; verify Cloudinary integration and UI rendering.
column6: Admin logged in; Cloudinary configured; valid image file available.

column5: Display category list and search/filter categories (if supported).
column6: Admin logged in; categories exist.

column5: Update an existing category; validate duplicate/empty/whitespace and ensure changes are reflected correctly.
column6: Admin logged in; a category exists.

column5: Delete a category; enforce business constraints when category is linked to foods/variants.
column6: Admin logged in; category exists; at least one linked category for constraint testing.

column5: Create a unit of measure used by variants; validate uniqueness and format.
column6: Admin logged in.

column5: List, update, delete units; enforce constraints when a unit is referenced by variants.
column6: Admin logged in; units exist; at least one unit is referenced by a variant.

column5: Update food information (name/description/category/status); verify impact on customer menu visibility.
column6: Admin logged in; food exists.

column5: Delete a food item; verify it no longer appears on customer menu and constraints are enforced.
column6: Admin logged in; food exists.

column5: Upload/replace food image; validate file type/size and verify image renders on admin and customer UI.
column6: Admin logged in; Cloudinary configured; valid/invalid image files available.

column5: Create a variant with valid unit/size/price; verify it appears under correct food and is selectable by customers.
column6: Admin logged in; food exists; units exist.

column5: Update variant fields; validate input; ensure customer menu reflects changes.
column6: Admin logged in; variant exists.

column5: Delete a variant; verify constraints and customer cannot order deleted variant.
column6: Admin logged in; variant exists.

column5: Upload/replace variant image (if supported); validate file type/size and UI rendering.
column6: Admin logged in; Cloudinary configured.

column5: List branches and view branch details (address/status/hub mapping); verify manager scope if applicable.
column6: Admin and Manager accounts exist; at least 2 branches exist.

column5: Create a new branch with valid address/location; validate required fields; verify it appears in branch list.
column6: Admin logged in.

column5: Update branch info/status (activate/deactivate if supported); verify customer branch selection respects status.
column6: Admin logged in; branch exists.

column3: Deactivate Branch with Existing Orders (Rule Check)
column5: Attempt to deactivate a branch that has active/pending orders; system enforces business rule and shows proper message.
column6: Admin logged in; a branch has active orders.

column5: View inventory per branch by variant; verify correct quantities and filtering/pagination if available.
column6: Admin or Manager logged in; variants exist; inventory records exist.

column5: Adjust stock quantity for a variant; validate input and persistence.
column6: Admin or Manager logged in; inventory record exists.

column5: Attempt to reduce stock below zero; system blocks with proper error.
column6: Admin or Manager logged in; inventory quantity is low.

column5: When inventory reaches zero, customer menu/order flow is blocked or shows out-of-stock as per rule; verify end-to-end consistency.
column6: Variant stock is 0; customer sees the same variant.

column5: View orders list; filter by status/branch/date (if supported); ensure correctness and manager scope.
column6: Admin and Manager accounts exist; multiple orders exist across branches.

column5: View order detail and verify branch/hub information displayed correctly.
column6: Admin logged in; order exists; hub mapping exists if applicable.

column3: Update Order Status with Valid Transition
column5: Update order/delivery status following valid transitions; verify customer MyOrders reflects updates.
column6: Admin or Manager logged in; order exists in valid prior status.

column5: Attempt invalid state transition (status jump); system blocks and returns appropriate error.
column6: Admin logged in; order exists.

column3: Reconcile Payment Status vs Order Status Rule
column5: Ensure order status updates respect payment status rules (e.g., cannot mark delivered if unpaid depending on policy).
column6: Admin logged in; orders exist with different payment statuses.

column5: Branch manager sees only staff in their branch; admin sees all staff.
column6: Admin and Manager accounts exist; staff exist across branches.

column5: Create/update staff within allowed scope; enforce manager restrictions (cannot create admins).
column6: Admin or Manager logged in; role policies exist.

column5: Manage admin accounts; only admin can create/disable admins; validate security rules.
column6: Admin logged in; admin management feature exists.

column5: View customers list and detail; disable customer if supported; verify disabled customer cannot login.
column6: Admin logged in; customers exist.

column5: Create/list/update/delete hubs; validate required fields and linkage rules.
column6: Admin logged in; at least 1 branch exists.

column5: Create/list/update/delete drone/shipper; update availability/status; validate constraints.
column6: Admin logged in; at least 1 hub exists.
